Cashbook Budgeting. Realtime.


 

Straight forward Budget Tracking

Imagine youâ€™ve given yourself a monthly spending limit of $100 for coffee. Halfway through the month you buy a coffee with your debit card, and a minute later you get an alert on your phone that you have spent $88.90 on coffee this month and have $11.10 left in your budget. Cashbook helps people understand their relationship with money so they can make better, more informed choices. By setting spending targets, your members will see at a glance how they're doing with their budgeting.

 

Monthly Snapshots

No boring lists here. Cashbook's calendar helps members identify their earning and spending patterns over time. View all spending data, only deposits or withdrawals, or even narrow down to a single category like groceries, entertainment, or utilities.

 

Features

  • Customize budget categories (add new ones, rename existing ones).
  • Set monthly spending targets and visualize spending behaviour.
  • Review past spending behaviour to identify trends.
  • Set up email or SMS text alerts of updated budget-related totals after transactions are made.

About Pennyminder

We believe credit unions are the most sustainable, responsible way to bank, and we're dedicated to helping you succeed by providing tools and solutions to empower your members to manage their finances more easily and to make better choices about their finances. We're located in Mission British Columbia in the heart of the Fraser Valley
